title: A Governor Talks About Making Life Affordable
summary: Governor Abigail Spanberger from Virginia talked about how President Trump's policies are not helping people save money on things like health care and housing. She said that Democrats are working hard to make life more affordable for everyone. In a speech, she asked if the president is making life cheaper for families, and she said no. Spanberger is the first woman governor in Virginia and was elected recently. She is known for criticizing President Trump. This article is about her response to the president's speech, where she shared her views on affordability issues.
